title: WTB: T207 Fisher white cap var.
author: BuzzD

posts.post_title: WTB: T207 Fisher white cap var.
posts.post_content: Anybody have a T207 Fisher white cap available to complete my team set?  Raw or graded decent 2 or 3-ish?
There is a Fisher white cap in the current REA Auction.
I have a raw Fisher white cap that falls in the vg range with great eye appeal.
